## Notes
1. LaTeX learning resource: <https://www.overleaf.com/learn/latex/Learn_LaTeX_in_30_minutes>
2. Beamer Overleaf intro: <https://www.overleaf.com/learn/latex/Beamer>

## Exercises
1. Read Overleaf's Beamer intro.
2. Write a Beamer presentation with a biography of a mathematician of your choice.
  Presentation should include the following elements:
  - title
  - several types of boxes
  - custom theme
  - images
  - formulas
